column1: Bosscat Kitchen & Libations////For the main course
column2: I had the HRW pork chop. A+. I mean
column3: I have seen many places butcher pork chops. This was cooked perfectly with a unique glaze that made it truly special. Charred broccolini. Perfect. Not a fancy dish
column4: but flavorful and super enjoyable. Portion was perfect. Not skimpy or huge.
